text: O ona verit ona nie befriend Moj enemies tvoj enemies extending laska friendship them vecer they disbelieved truth pojdem ona! They persecute posol ona iba ona verit v GOD tvoj Lord Ona mobilize struggle do Moj zapricinit seeking Moj blessings ako ona secretly laska them? Ja je fully aware z everything ona zatajit everything ona declare Those among ona robit this have indeed strayed na pravo chodnicek
